title: OIC-COMSTECH chief lauds Huawei’s 5G-A innovations at MWC Barcelona 2025
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 09 (APP):Coordinator General of OIC-COMSTECH, Prof Dr Iqbal Choudhary, has commended Huawei’s pioneering contributions to 5G-A intelligent core network solutions and its role in fostering global collaboration in the telecommunications sector.
During an interaction with global technology leaders at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) Barcelona 2025, Dr Choudhary acknowledged Huawei’s advancements, stating, “On behalf of OIC-COMSTECH, I am honored to recognize Huawei’s outstanding contributions to MWC Barcelona 2025.
Their pioneering advancements in 5G technology and commitment to fostering global cooperation have set new industry benchmarks. Huawei’s focus on innovation, sustainability, and inclusiveness aligns closely with our mission to promote scientific and technological cooperation among OIC member states.”
MWC Barcelona 2025 witnessed the launch of Huawei’s 5G-A intelligent core network solutions and featured 83 global showcases across 71 key industrial scenarios, demonstrating cutting-edge applications in telecommunications.
In a significant development following a recent cybersecurity event jointly organized by OIC-COMSTECH and Huawei, the Pakistan Telecommunication Authority (PTA) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with Huawei. The partnership aims to strengthen Pakistan’s cybersecurity framework, enhance technological capabilities, and drive innovation within the telecommunications sector.
OIC-COMSTECH and Huawei have been actively collaborating on various initiatives, including capacity-building programs, digital transformation projects, and research partnerships aimed at enhancing technological expertise across OIC member states. These efforts underscore their shared commitment to promoting scientific cooperation, innovation, and knowledge-sharing in the Muslim world.
Dr Choudhary’s participation at MWC Barcelona 2025 reaffirmed OIC-COMSTECH’s dedication to advancing scientific and technological progress while strengthening international partnerships in emerging technologies.
